# Getting Started

## Install and launching R packages

The code chunk below use p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages have been installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,)
```

## Importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

# Plotting a simple bar chart

```{r}
ggplot(data=exam_data,aes(x=RACE)) + 
  geom_bar()
```
